# vertex-viewer-measurement-popover



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Type                  | Default                  |
| ------------------ | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ------------------------ |
| `measurementModel` | --                |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `MeasurementModel`    | `new MeasurementModel()` |
| `viewerSelector`   | `viewer-selector` | A CSS selector that points to a `<vertex-viewer>` element. Providing this selector will cause this popover to be constrained to the viewport of the viewer. Not providing this selector will allow the popover to be repositioned anywhere within the window. | `string \| undefined` | `undefined`              |
